1.content: Research comprehensive London street database sources
1.details: Find reliable sources for complete street lists for all London boroughs, specifically for SE postcode areas. Options: 1) UK government open data (ONS/Postcode databases), 2) Ordnance Survey data, 3) London Borough council street databases, 4) Comprehensive UK postal address databases. Focus on SE1, SE2, SE3, SE4, SE5, SE7, SE8, SE9, SE11, SE12, SE13, SE14, SE15, SE16, SE17, SE18.

2.content: Extract and process comprehensive street data
2.details: 1. Download/extract complete street lists for each SE area from identified sources, 2. Clean and validate street names (remove duplicates, fake entries), 3. Map streets to correct SE areas using postcodes, 4. Format data to match database schema (street_name + postcode area format: 'High Street, SE1'), 5. Ensure each street is unique within its area.

3.content: Bulk import all SE area street records
3.details: 1. Import all processed street records for all 16 SE areas (SE1, SE2, SE3, SE4, SE5, SE7, SE8, SE9, SE11, SE12, SE13, SE14, SE15, SE16, SE17, SE18), 2. Use batch processing for efficiency, 3. Ensure 100% success rate, 4. Verify complete coverage of all SE areas.
